hibernate-mapping.query: select new omis.health.report.ProviderSummary(pa.id, pa.provider.name.firstName, pa.provider.name.lastName, pa.provider.name.middleName, pa.title.name, pa.title.abbreviation, pa.title.category, pa.dateRange.startDate, pa.dateRange.endDate, mf.name, pa.facility.name, address, pa.contracted) from omis.health.domain.ProviderAssignment pa left join pa.medicalFacility as mf left join pa.facility.location.address as address where pa.facility = :facility and (((:startDate > pa.dateRange.startDate or pa.dateRange.startDate is null) and (:startDate < pa.dateRange.endDate or pa.dateRange.endDate is null)) or ((:endDate > pa.dateRange.startDate or pa.dateRange.startDate is null) and (:endDate < pa.dateRange.endDate or pa.dateRange.endDate is null)) or ((pa.dateRange.startDate > :startDate and (pa.dateRange.startDate < :endDate or :endDate is null)) or pa.dateRange.startDate is null)) or (pa.dateRange.endDate > :startDate and (pa.dateRange.endDate < :endDate or :endDate is null)))

select new omis.health.report.ProviderSummary(pa.id, pa.provider.name.firstName, pa.provider.name.lastName, pa.provider.name.middleName, pa.title.name, pa.title.abbreviation, pa.title.category, pa.dateRange.startDate, pa.dateRange.endDate, mf.name, pa.facility.name, address, pa.contracted) from omis.health.domain.ProviderAssignment pa left join pa.medicalFacility as mf left join pa.facility.location.address as address where pa.facility = :facility and (pa.dateRange.startDate <= :date or pa.dateRange.startDate is null) and (pa.dateRange.endDate >= :date or pa.dateRange.endDate is null)
